basics.name: Hanna S. Qubti
basics.label: Architect
basics.summary:
Click here to view my portfolio 

 Graduation project animated (video) 



 I am a creative, determined, and passionate architect. I have been in love with architecture since I was twelve years old. I am a dedicated team player with promising leading capabalities. I enjoy excellent communication and collaboration skills. In addition, I aquire a strong sense of design and problem solving. I am very passionate about conceptual visualization and have a keen eye for detail.


 Awards and Certificates 

 • 03 - 05 Al Ra’ed Al Arabi Arts competition: Excellence in Arts (3 consecutive wins)

 • 2014 Masters of Architecture Exhibition: Representing Arch. Minoru Yamasaki (Organizer and Representing former World Trade Center in New York, USA)

 • 2015 Intercultural Dialog Towards Reclaiming Public Spaces within Metropolitan Areas: (Participation certificate in urban design workshop between GJU and TU Dortmund).

 • 2016 Shortlisted for the Jordanian Engineers Assosiation graduation project competition. (Top 16 projects out of 98 qualified projects in architecture nationwide).

work.company: American University of Madaba (AUM) - Faculty of Architecture & Design
work.summary: I am currently working at the faculty of architecture and design as an architect assisting my fellow professors and senior academics in the design studios. I also supervise technical graphics and building construction classes. In addition, I am currently in charge of the renovation and fixation of the interior space of three abandoned existing pedestrian bridges in order to reactivate them as display and exhibition space for our faculty. I was also appointed as the spokesperson representing the faculty of architecture and design at AUM among local educational institutes.

work.company: Reich und Wamsar GbR, Düsseldorf, DE
work.summary: I worked on various projects both in exterior and interior architecture. Ranging from ski resort compound named MATLAS in Russia containing two five star hotels, several motels, shopping malls, restaurants, playing fields, and a spa. In addition to a group of duty free retailer stores in Oslo International Airport, Norway, belonging to prominent nordic fashion brands like GANT, PEAK PERFORMANCE, and BERGANZ.

work.company: TURATH: Architecture & Urban Design Consultants, Amman, JO
work.summary: During my internship at TURATH I helped in the detail construction drawings or two projects, a mosque, and a house. I also carried an intensive research on rammed earth construction methodologies. In addition, I was also lucky to have worked on the conceptual phase of the Al Shaumari Wildlife Reserve Visitor Center in Al-Azraq, JO.

education.institution: University of Applied Sciences, Würzburg, DE
